title: What is the large (multi-story)white mound visible along the shore upriver (north) of Southport when crossing on the Ft Fisher Ferry.  It looks like a huge very white sand dune/mountain or salt mound.  It seems to have some vegetation growing out of it so salt would seem unlikely!
text:
I believe this previous post to MyReporter.com will answer your
question: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7329
